content.text: Hey, I'm a huge fan of sushi. What are your favorite kinds?
I love salmon and avocado rolls. I also like the tuna and eel rolls.
Those are all great. I also like the shrimp tempura roll.
Have you tried any of the sushi burritos?
No, I haven't. What are they like?
They're kind of like a California roll, but they're wrapped in a tortilla instead of seaweed.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to try one next time I go to the sushi restaurant.
I also like to make sushi at home. It's not too hard to do.
Really? I've never tried making it at home before.
Yeah, it's pretty easy. You can find a lot of recipes online.
I might have to try that sometime. I'm always looking for new things to cook.
I'm sure you'd like it. It's a lot of fun to make and it's delicious.
Thanks for the tip. I'll have to try it soon.
